articles.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 campaign can't be paused, has no checkpoints, and kicks idle players - TechSpot
articles.description: Critics and day-one players are reporting that Treyarch and Raven Software essentially designed the story campaign in Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 exclusively for online play....
articles.content: Facepalm: The past several Call of Duty games have required constant internet connections, even in the solo campaign mode, but early reviews of Black Ops 7 describe it as a truly online-first experie… [+3520 chars]
